synopsis.text: School girl ping pong is ablaze with new possibilities as the once invincible Oudou Academy is dethroned, ending their nine-year reign. Enter Suzumegahara Middle School, a team brimming with potential but yet to make their mark beyond local city tournaments. The team boasts a diverse set of skills, from Hanabi Tenka's rapid-fire attacks to captain Kiruka Ushirode's ironclad defense. However, their fortunes begin to change with the arrival of Koyori Tsumujikaze, a passionate transfer student whose love for the game is contagious. Together, they embark on an ambitious quest to claim the national championship, igniting a thrilling journey of camaraderie and competition in the world of girls' junior high ping pong.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
